onboarding.title: Human Support

step_1.content_1: Welcome to Weni! Discover the Human Support module now to learn how to harness its full potential.
step_1.content_2: To start, keep in mind that the system assigns chats automatically. This means each new conversation is routed to an available agent. However, if needed, you can also manually take over a chat from the queue. Here‚Äôs how it works:

step_2.content_1: General history: access all completed support sessions under View Options > Chat History.
step_2.content_2: Contact history: view previous conversations with a specific contact (if any) in the History button within the support chat.

step_3.content_1: Quick messages: create templates for ready-made responses to speed up your customer service. Type the shortcut ‚Äú/‚Äù in the chat text field, or click on + (More) > Quick messages.
step_3.content_2: Internal note: add observations and context about the service, visible only to your team. Click on + (More) > Internal note.

step_4.content_1: Discussion: ask your team to collaborate to discuss the service and find the best solution. Go to the section All information > About the support > Start discussion.
step_4.content_2: Classify the support (tags): add tags to organize and filter the service while it is ongoing. Go to the section All Information > About the support > + (More) Tag.

step_5.content_1: Transfer contact: if you need to pass the call to a colleague on the team, you can transfer the contact at any time. To do this, click the Transfer contact button in the top menu of the conversation.
step_5.content_2: End chat: to finish, click the End Chat button. You can also take this opportunity to rate the support at this time.

onboarding.ended_text: The initial tour of the Chats module has ended! üéâ For more information, visit our Help Center.

home.title: Hello there,

onboarding.title: New Feature: Summary by AI
onboarding.description: From now on, whenever you open a chat, you will see a summary with the key information from the client's previous chat with the AI. This feature is designed to help you save time and quickly gain context.

on_boarding.title: Getting started with Chats
on_boarding.description_sector: Create a sector to manage a service team, you can create as many sectors as you want, so you can manage your service groups by departments, products or services.
on_boarding.description_queues: Use queues to segment your calls by subject or products, if you don't want to, just create a queue.
on_boarding.description_tags: Create tags to classify chats, tags can be used to generate reports, filter calls in the history and much more!
on_boarding.tooltip: Chats is Weni's human service module, check out the step by step to get started

integration.start: To use, integrate with ChatGPT by
